I read many comments regarding the heating issue. I also faced the same problem and I got the reason for this. This phone have a feature of RAM extension which uses the swap memory(Which means it uses internal memory as ram if the physical RAM is full) also the speed of internal memory is not equal to physical RAM, so when you use multiple apps, its start using internal memory as a RAM which is not able to handle app switching as physical RAM can do and start struggle, which leads to starting heat. This is my first phone with an inbuilt memory extension feature but I already use this feature in old android by rooting methods when RAM was only 256 or 512 MB.  So don't use the memory extension feature, As per my knowledge, there is no solution even from the software side to resolve it, in today's market companies only make fool us by introducing this type of foolish feature. Just turn off the memory extension feature and if you need more RAM, Go to a higher version, upvote my comment if you read till end and if you find it useful.

I read many comments regarding the heating issue. I also faced the same problem and I got the reason for this. This phone have a feature of RAM extension which uses the swap memory(Which means it uses internal memory as ram if the physical RAM is full) also the speed of internal memory is not equal to physical RAM, so when you use multiple apps, its start using internal memory as a RAM which is not able to handle app switching as physical RAM can do and start struggle, which leads to starting heat. This is my first phone with an inbuilt memory extension feature but I already use this feature in old android by rooting methods when RAM was only 256 or 512 MB.  So don't use the memory extension feature, As per my knowledge, there is no solution even from the software side to resolve it, in today's market companies only make fool us by introducing this type of foolish feature. Just turn off the memory extension feature and if you need more RAM, Go to a higher version, upvote my comment if you read till end and if you find it useful.
